SELECT P.PATIENT_KEY, P.PATIENT_NAME, P.PATIENT_AGE, P.PATIENT_SEX, R.RECEIPT_KEY, MC.CHART_KEY, WH.WAITING_KEY, WH.WAITING_STATUS, TO_CHAR(WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME,'HH24:MI PM' ) WAITING_CHANGE_TIME, MC.CHART_CONT, OH.ORDER_KEY, CC2.CODE_NAME BODY_PART_KEY, E.EMP_NAME, ME.EQUIPMENT_NAME, ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY, CC3.CODE_NAME WAITING_STATUS_NAME FROM PATIENT P
LEFT OUTER JOIN RECEIPT R ON P.PATIENT_KEY = R.PATIENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN WAITING_HISTORY WH ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = WH.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART MC ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = MC.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_KEY = MC.EMP_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ME ON ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY = OH.EQUIPMENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC1 ON CC1.CODE = R.OFFICE_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.CODE = OH.BODY_PART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.CODE = WH.WAITING_STATUS
WHERE WH.WAITING_LOCATION = 'L004' AND OH.ORDER_KIND = 'O001' AND ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY IS NOT NULL
AND (P.PATIENT_KEY, WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME) IN ( SELECT P.PATIENT_KEY, MAX(WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME) FROM PATIENT P LEFT OUTER JOIN RECEIPT R ON P.PATIENT_KEY = R.PATIENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN WAITING_HISTORY WH ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = WH.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART MC ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = MC.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_KEY = MC.EMP_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ME ON ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY = OH.EQUIPMENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC1 ON CC1.CODE = R.OFFICE_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.CODE = OH.BODY_PART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.CODE = WH.WAITING_STATUS WHERE WH.WAITING_LOCATION = 'L004' AND OH.ORDER_KIND = 'O001' AND ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY IS NOT NULL GROUP BY P.PATIENT_KEY )
ORDER BY WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME
SELECT EQUIPMENT_KEY, EQUIPMENT_NAME, EQUIPMENT_MODEL FROM MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT WHERE EQUIPMENT_LOCATION != 'L005'
SELECT ME.EQUIPMENT_NAME, ME.EQUIPMENT_MODEL, B.BUYER_NAME, B.BUYER_CHARGER, B.BUYER_TEL FROM MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ME, BUYER B WHERE ME.BUYER_KEY = B.BUYER_KEY AND ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY = #{equipmentKey}

SELECT TO_CHAR(ER.EQUIPMENT_RECORD_DATE,'YY/MM/DD' ) EQUIPMENT_RECORD_DATE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE ER.EQUIPMENT_RECORD_STATUS = C.CODE) AS EQUIPMENT_RECORD_STATUS , ER.EQUIPMENT_RECORD_CONTENT , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP.EMP_KEY = ER.EQUIPMENT_RECORD_WRITER) AS EQUIPMENT_RECORD_WRITER FROM EQUIPMENT_STATUS_RECORD ER, MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ME WHERE ER.EQUIPMENT_KEY = ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY AND ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY = #{equipmentKey} ORDER BY ER.EQUIPMENT_RECORD_KEY DESC

SELECT MEDICAL_CHART.PATIENT_KEY, MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT_NAME, C1.CODE_NAME PT_EQUIPMENT_STATUS, PT_EQUIPMENT.PT_EQUIPMENT_CODE, MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT_KEY, PT_EQUIPMENT.PT_EQUIPMENT_KEY, ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KEY, PATIENT.PATIENT_NAME, MEDICAL_CHART.RECEIPT_KEY FROM PT_EQUIPMENT LEFT JOIN MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ON PT_EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT_KEY = MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT_KEY RIGHT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY ON ORDER_HISTORY.EQUIPMENT_KEY = MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT_KEY RIGHT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART ON MEDICAL_CHART.CHART_KEY = ORDER_HISTORY.CHART_KEY RIGHT OUTER JOIN RECEIPT ON RECEIPT.RECEIPT_KEY = MEDICAL_CHART.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE C1 ON C1.CODE = PT_EQUIPMENT.PT_EQUIPMENT_STATUS RIGHT OUTER JOIN PATIENT ON PATIENT.PATIENT_KEY = MEDICAL_CHART.PATIENT_KEY WHERE ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KIND ='O001' AND PT_EQUIPMENT.PT_EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'US01' AND ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KEY =#{orderKey}
ORDER BY PT_EQUIPMENT.PT_EQUIPMENT_KEY
SELECT PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY ,PT_ROOM.PT_BED_STATUS , PT_ROOM.ORDER_KEY , PT_ROOM.PT_BED_STATUS_TIME FROM PT_ROOM
mapper.update: UPDATE PT_ROOM SET PT_BED_STATUS = #{ptBedStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PT_EQUIPMENT_KEY = #{ptEquipmentKey, jdbcType=INTEGER}, PT_BED_STATUS_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE PT_BED_KEY = #{ptBedKey, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY ,PT_ROOM.PT_BED_STATUS, PT_RECORD.ORDER_KEY FROM PT_ROOM LEFT OUTER JOIN PT_RECORD ON PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY = PT_RECORD.PT_BED_KEY

SELECT PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY , PT_ROOM.PT_BED_STATUS
, PT_RECORD.PT_RECORD_DATE , MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT_NAME , PATIENT.PATIENT_NAME , PATIENT.PATIENT_AGE , PATIENT.PATIENT_SEX , DISEASE.DISEASE_NM_EN , EMP.EMP_NAME , PT_RECORD.PT_RECORD_CONTENT
,ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KEY
FROM PT_ROOM LEFT OUTER JOIN PT_RECORD ON PT_RECORD.PT_BED_KEY = PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY ON PT_RECORD.ORDER_KEY = ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART ON MEDICAL_CHART.CHART_KEY = ORDER_HISTORY.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN PATIENT ON MEDICAL_CHART.PATIENT_KEY = PATIENT.PATIENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP ON EMP.EMP_KEY = MEDICAL_CHART.EMP_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN DIAGNOSIS ON DIAGNOSIS.CHART_KEY = MEDICAL_CHART.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN DISEASE ON DISEASE.DISEASE_KEY = DIAGNOSIS.DISEASE_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ON MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT_KEY = ORDER_HISTORY.EQUIPMENT_KEY ORDER BY PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY

SELECT CHART_CONT , MC.CHART_KEY ,P.PATIENT_KEY ,P.PATIENT_NAME ,P.PATIENT_REGNO1 , (SELECT DISEASE_NM_KR FROM DISEASE WHERE DISEASE.DISEASE_KEY = D.DISEASE_KEY) AS DISEASE_NM_KR , (SELECT DISEASE_NM_EN FROM DISEASE WHERE DISEASE.DISEASE_KEY = D.DISEASE_KEY) AS DISEASE_NM_EN , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP.EMP_KEY = MC.EMP_KEY) AS EMP_NAME FROM MEDICAL_CHART MC LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON(MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN DIAGNOSIS D ON (MC.CHART_KEY = D.CHART_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN PATIENT P ON (MC.PATIENT_KEY = P.PATIENT_KEY) WHERE MC.CHART_KEY = ( SELECT CHART_KEY FROM ORDER_HISTORY WHERE ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey} ) AND ORDER_KIND = 'O001'

SELECT PR.PT_RECORD_DATE ,(SELECT PT_BED_STATUS FROM PT_ROOM WHERE PR.PT_BED_KEY = PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY) AS PT_BED_STATUS ,(SELECT PT_EQUIPMENT_KEY FROM PT_ROOM WHERE PR.PT_BED_KEY = PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY) AS PT_EQUIPMENT_KEY ,(SELECT PT_BED_KEY FROM PT_ROOM WHERE PR.PT_BED_KEY = PT_ROOM.PT_BED_KEY) AS PT_BED_KEY ,(SELECT EQUIPMENT_KEY FROM ORDER_HISTORY WHERE PR.ORDER_KEY = ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KEY) AS EQUIPMENT_KEY ,(SELECT EQUIPMENT_NAME FROM MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ME JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY = OH.EQUIPMENT_KEY WHERE OH.ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey}) AS EQUIPMENT_NAME , ( SELECT P.PATIENT_NAME FROM ( SELECT MC.PATIENT_KEY FROM MEDICAL_CHART MC JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY WHERE OH.ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey} ) A, PATIENT P WHERE P.PATIENT_KEY = A.PATIENT_KEY ) AS PATIENT_NAME FROM PT_RECORD PR, ORDER_HISTORY OH WHERE PR.ORDER_KEY = OH.ORDER_KEY AND OH.ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE WAITING_HISTORY SET WAITING_STATUS = 'WS01' , WAITING_LOCATION = 'L008' , WAITING_CHANGE_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE RECEIPT_KEY = #{receiptKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE WAITING_HISTORY SET WAITING_STATUS = 'WS01' , WAITING_LOCATION = 'L006' , WAITING_CHANGE_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE RECEIPT_KEY = #{receiptKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
